{{cpp/io/basic_streambuf/title|setg}}
{{cpp/io/basic_streambuf/navbar}}
{{ddcl|1=
protected:
void setg( char_type* gbeg, char_type* gcurr, char_type* gend );
}}

Sets the values of the pointers defining the get area.

After the call, {{c|1=eback() == gbeg}}, {{c|1=gptr() == gcurr}} and {{c|1=egptr() == gend}} are all {{c|true}}.

If any of {{range|gbeg|gend}}, {{range|gbeg|gcurr}} and {{range|gcurr|gend}} is not a [[cpp/iterator#Ranges|valid range]], the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|gbeg|pointer to the new beginning of the get area}}
{{par|gcurr|pointer to the new current character (''get pointer'') in the get area}}
{{par|gend|pointer to the new end of the get area}}
{{par end}}
